rdfs:comment: They eat grasses and broad-leafed plants

carnivore.rdfs:comment: Carnivores are exactly those animals that eat only animals.

rdfs:comment: Giraffes are herbivores, and they eat only leaves.

herbivore.rdfs:comment: Herbivores are exactly those animals that eat only plants or parts of plants

lion.rdfs:comment: Lions are animals that eat only herbivores.

tasty-plant.rdfs:comment: Plants eaten both by herbivores and carnivores

rdfs:comment: Trees are a type of plant.
'plant' is here a shorthand for plant kingdom
